com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.sensors

Class SensorUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ohtu.wearable.wearabledataservice.sensors.SensorUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.hardware.SensorEventListener

    public class SensorUnit
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener
    Class to control, listen and collect data from a sensor that has been assigned to it.

      • listenSensor

        public void listenSensor(int listenTime)
        Takes parameter to define time to listen before stopping sensorlistener
        Parameters:
        listenTime - Length of time defining how long sensor keeps waiting for new requests before its listener is unregistered
